\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\phantomsection\label{index::doc}\begin{quote}
\end{quote}



Erebot\_Module\_AutoConnect is a module for \href{https://www.erebot.net/}{Erebot} that makes the bot
automatically connect to some IRC networks upon startup.

Any network configuration with this module loaded (and active) will
be marked as requiring auto-connection upon startup.

Contents:
\begin{quote}
\end{quote}


\chapter{Prerequisites}
\label{Prerequisites:prerequisites}\label{Prerequisites:welcome-to-the-documentation-for-erebot-module-autoconnect}\label{Prerequisites::doc}
The following dependencies must be installed in order for this module
to work properly:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
PHP \textgreater{}= 5.2.2

\item {} 
Erebot (some specific version may be required depending
on this module's version)

\item {} 
Erebot\_API (some specific version may be required depending
on this module's version)

\end{itemize}

Erebot (core) adds its own set of prerequisites which usually already
cover those.
\begin{quote}
\end{quote}


\chapter{Configuration}
\label{Configuration:configuration}\label{Configuration::doc}\label{Configuration:id1}

\section{Configuration options}
\label{Configuration:configuration-options}
This module offers no configuration options.


\section{Configuration example}
\label{Configuration:configuration-example}
The recommended way to use this module is to have it loaded at the general
configuration level and to disable it only for specific networks.

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+cp}{\PYGZlt{}?xml version=\PYGZdq{}1.0\PYGZdq{}?\PYGZgt{}}
\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}configuration}
  \PYG{n+na}{xmlns=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}http://localhost/Erebot/\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{n+na}{version=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}...\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{n+na}{language=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}fr\PYGZhy{}FR\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{n+na}{timezone=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}Europe/Paris\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{n+na}{commands\PYGZhy{}prefix=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}!\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}

    \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}modules}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{c}{\PYGZlt{}!\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{ Other modules ignored for clarity. }\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}module} \PYG{n+na}{name=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}\textbar{}project\textbar{}\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{n+nt}{/\PYGZgt{}}
    \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/modules\PYGZgt{}}

    \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}networks}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{c}{\PYGZlt{}!\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{ The bot WILL NOT auto}\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{connect to this network upon startup. }\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}network} \PYG{n+na}{name=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}localhost\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}modules}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
                \PYG{c}{\PYGZlt{}!\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}
\PYG{c}{                    Disable auto}\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{connection for the local IRC server,}
\PYG{c}{                    which is used only for debugging purposes.}
\PYG{c}{                }\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}}
                \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}module} \PYG{n+na}{name=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}\textbar{}project\textbar{}\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{n+na}{active=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}false\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{n+nt}{/\PYGZgt{}}
            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/modules\PYGZgt{}}

            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}servers}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
                \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}server} \PYG{n+na}{url=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}irc://localhost:6667/\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{n+nt}{/\PYGZgt{}}
            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/servers\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/network\PYGZgt{}}

        \PYG{c}{\PYGZlt{}!\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{ The bot WILL auto}\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{c}{connect to this network upon startup. }\PYG{c}{\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}network} \PYG{n+na}{name=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}IIEns\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}servers}\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZgt{}}
                \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}server} \PYG{n+na}{url=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}irc://irc.iiens.net:6667/\PYGZdq{}} \PYG{n+nt}{/\PYGZgt{}}
            \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/servers\PYGZgt{}}
        \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/network\PYGZgt{}}
    \PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/networks\PYGZgt{}}
\PYG{n+nt}{\PYGZlt{}/configuration\PYGZgt{}}
\end{Verbatim}
\begin{quote}
\end{quote}


\chapter{Usage}
\label{Usage:usage}\label{Usage::doc}
This module does not provide any command. Just add this module to your
configuration and you're done.

Current status on \href{http://travis-ci.org/}{http://travis-ci.org/}: \href{https://travis-ci.org/Erebot/Erebot\_Module\_AutoConnect/}{}



\renewcommand{\indexname}{Index}
\printindex
